title: nEvermore! Tales of Murder, Mystery and the Macabre
description: Compiled by multi-award winning editors, Nancy Kilpatrick and Caro Soles, nEvermore! Tales of Murder, Mystery and the Macabre presents a tantalizing selection of imaginative stories by New York Times bestselling and prize-winning authors, including: Colleen Anderson Kelley Armstrong Margaret Atwood Robert Bose Jane Petersen Burfield Rick Chiantaretto J. Madison Davis Barbara Fradkin Nancy Holder Michael Jecks Tanith Lee Robert Lopresti Richard Christian Matheson David McDonald Lisa Morton William Nolan (with Jason Brock, Sunni Brock) Loren Rhoads Christopher Rice Thomas S. Roche Uwe Sommerlad Carol Weekes & Michael Kelly Chelsea Quinn Yarbro This anthology consists of 22 original tales that blend supernatural and mystery elements in unique re-imaginings of Edgar Allan Poe's exquisite stories. nEvermore! Tales of Murder, Mystery and the Macabre is an homage to the great American writer, the incomparable Edgar Allan Poe, and a must-have for every fan of his work.
author: Nancy Kilpatrick
